GSD.description:
efi: runtime: avoid EFIv2 runtime services on Apple x86 machines

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.16.5 by commit a4085859411c825c321c9b55b8a9dc5a128a6684. For more details please see the references link.
